summary: Core three-panel layout components were added (LeftSidebar, RightDetailsPanel) and AppLayout/LibraryPage/CatalogSongRowCard were updated toward the Spotify-style shell and tracklist. However, the mobile/responsive navigation accessibility and the exact required nav items are not fully met, and several unrelated functional enhancements were introduced beyond the layout-only request.

missing_requirements.requirement: Left sidebar must include primary navigation actions (Library, My Library, Pricing, Admin when available) routing to '/', '/my-library', '/pricing', '/admin'.
missing_requirements.reason: The sidebar navigation items shown are 'Home', 'My Library', and 'Pricing'; there is no 'Library' item as specified (even though '/' exists).

missing_requirements.requirement: On smaller viewports, left sidebar adapts (collapsed or stacked) while navigation remains accessible, and layout remains usable without horizontal scrolling.
missing_requirements.reason: Left sidebar is entirely hidden on small viewports ("hidden lg:flex"), but the diff summary does not show any alternative/collapsed/stacked navigation UI for mobile to keep navigation accessible.

hallucinated_features.description: Enhanced React Query hooks to allow anonymous streaming / graceful null returns for public streaming queries.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly scoped this as a layout-only update with backend unchanged; these behavioral changes were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Audio queue/player state changes including new actions like removeCurrent and closePlayer (full reset).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested as part of the layout work; BuildRequest says no real-time features and focuses on layout/presentation only.

hallucinated_features.description: Download gating UX changes (loading state handling, tooltip messaging).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-4 only requires preserving existing download actions; additional gating/UX behavior changes were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: AudioPlayerBar feature expansion (close button, robust error handling changes, control disabling behavior).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not required by any REQ; the request is about the page chrome/layout and track presentation.

hallucinated_features.description: Admin dashboard and song editor dialog behavior changes (upload/edit/delete handling, progress normalization, dialog state fixes).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; admin was only mentioned as a navigation item in the sidebar.

hallucinated_features.description: Pricing page content changes (trial/tier copy, badges, value justification).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; only navigation to existing '/pricing' route was required.
